snippet: The lawyers for Christian Falero say he was too deluded during the fatal stabbings of neighbors in Manhattan to know right from wrong.
abstract: Psychologist Cheryl Paradis appears for defense in murder trial of Christian Falero, who fatally stabbed two of his neighbors and wounded two others in Manhattan in 2011; Paradis testifies that Falero was acutely psychotic at time of events, supporting insanity defense.
lead_paragraph: The lawyers for Christian Falero say he was too deluded during the fatal stabbings of neighbors in Manhattan to know right from wrong.

headline.main: Delusions Led to 2 Killings, Psychologist Says at Trial
headline.print_headline: Delusions Led to 2 Killings, Psychologist Says at Trial
